attributes.additional_details:
If rioters can be evicted for offences relating to the riots of August 2011 then all convicted criminals should be evicted. This is fair to all. I fail to understand why convicted murderers and sex offenders are not evicted. I wish a debate in the house and a law passed that if any person in social housing is convicted of a crime they and their families are evicted the same as those involved in the riots.

This would be fair, what is good for one is good for another.
